titleStmt.title: Englands triumph a more exact history of His Majesties escape after the battle of Worcester : with a chronologicall discourse of his straits and dangerous adventures into France, his removes from place to place till his return into England with the most remarkable memorials since : to this present September, 1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.G. for Nathaniel Brook,

notesStmt.note: Running title: England's triumph, a more exact history of K. Charls the II.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
